summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1830, for the improvement of 22nd Avenue Northwest in the City of Seattle from Ballard Avenue to Shilshole Avenue, by planking the same and constructing wooden walks thereon, under Ordinance No. 19022 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
